item.name: F19 to F19
item.appendix: (F19 to Hyper (ctrl+shift+cmd+opt) + F19 Only, send escape)
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::ESCAPE

item.name: Hyper J to Down
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN

item.name: Hyper K to Up
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP

item.name: Hyper H to Left
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT

item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT

item.name: Hyper N to Beginning of Line
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::N, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Hyper ; to End of Line
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Hyper I to Top
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::I, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.name: Hyper M to Bottom
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::M, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L

item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L | ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::CAPSLOCK
